name: These New Worlds: creation engine
description:
These New Worlds extends the World-creation rules of There are Other Worlds than these by Nick Bate (ickbat.itch.io/other-worlds) to an engine for creating entire RPG's!

  • Everytime you play, it's totally new Story, World, and Experience!
  • Tailor it to your group! Have everyone make Funny cards, Scary cards, Sci-fi cards, you name it. Every game will create an RPG unique to you!
  • All you need to play are notecards or cardstock to cut into cards.
  • For 3-6 players. Gives every character (Exiles) a PBTA-esque playbook.
  • These mini-playbooks were inspired by And They Were Roommates! by
    georgiebats.
  • You can save the cards afterward to play with the same RPG system, characters, or Worlds multiple times. OR rip everything up and start anew.

This game was created for the #RefractionTTRPGjam

Use for anything besides resale.
